title: BlendJet 2
description: BlendJet 2 is the Next-Gen Blender and serves up big blender power on the go. We created the BlendJet 2 portable blender so you can make anything you want, anywhere in the world — from a mountaintop to your kitchen countertop. It’s easy and convenient to use at home, at work, outdoors, at the gym, in the car, at the beach, on vacation or wherever the day takes you.

It works great, as advertised, sometimes you need to run it two or three times but the battery life is great! I make smoothies and fun blended cocktails with it. Easy self cleaning process as advertised! (1 spin w soap and done if you clean right after use)

I was so skeptical of the Blendjet. I saw ads everywhere, and while I was having issues with my own mini blender for my smoothies I wasn't ready to take the plunge yet. Because it holds up to 15 charges, it's perfect to take to work as well if you keep some fruit on hand with water and yogurt. title: Jetsetter Insulated Sleeve
description:
Take your smoothie to go! Slip your BlendJet into this protective insulated pouch to keep your drink’s chill factor. Ideal for stashing your portable blender in your gym bag, purse or suitcase, or bringing something to sip on your commute.

JETSETTER INSULATED SLEEVE FEATURES:
  • Designed to hold your BlendJet One or 2
  • Constructed with durable, high quality materials to protect your BlendJet
  • Provides hours-worth of insulation to keep your ingredients cold
  • Water-repellent fabric
  • Zippered top closure
  • Built-in wrist strap makes it easy to carry
  • Easy to clean
MATERIALS & CARE:
  • Body: Durable water-repellent coated nylon
  • Lining: Durable water-repellent coated polyester fabric
  • 1 cm thick closed-cell poly foam insulation
  • Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Do not wash or dry clean.
DETAILS & SPECS:
  • Designed to fit both BlendJet One and BlendJet 2
  • Dimensions: 3.5” x 3.5” x 11 (9cm x 9cm x 28cm)
  • Weight: 2.4 oz (70.9 mL)
  • Volume: 1.6L
